__TOC__

This is the home of the lojbanistan Local Community Team! 

== Team Info ==
The Ubuntu Lojbanistan Local Community Team is a group of volunteers and activists organized around the Ubuntu operating system. We advocate <nowiki>[[http://lojban.org/|lojban]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[DigitalFreedom|digital freedom]]</nowiki> and aim to translate Ubuntu and promote it to other lojbananas as a means of approaching this. 

This team operates in accordance with the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/codeofconduct/1.0.1|Ubuntu Code of Conduct]]</nowiki>

(<nowiki>[[http://lojban.org/tiki/tiki-index.php?page=Lojbanistan|lojbanistan]]</nowiki> is the imaginary country which speaks lojban natively used to refer to the lojban community. A <nowiki>[[http://lojban.org/tiki/tiki-index.php?page=lojbanana|lojbanana]]</nowiki> is a lojban speaker.)

=== Goals ===
 1. Translate
** Make Ubuntu available in lojban
 1. Promote
** Advocate Ubuntu to lojbananas
 1. Supply
** Provide supplies and information for getting Ubuntu
 1. Support
** Offer support for getting and using Ubuntu in lojban
 1. Connect
** Bridge connections between lojban-speaking Ubuntu users
